mode.description: Mode of resizing operation. Please see operations documentation for details on each one.

upscale.description: Allow the resulting image to be bigger than the original one.

upscale_dpr.description: With the dpr stack option set, allow the resulting image to be "dpr" times bigger than the original one, even if "upscale" is false.

enabled.description: If set to false, will not use this operation for rendering.

angle.description: Clockwise rotation angle of the image. Can be fractional, example: "120.3"

background_color.description: Color to use in background in hex without the # sign, example: "0F0F0F"

background_opacity.description: Opacity of background. Default is 0, transparent. Goes up to 100 for opaque.

enabled.description: If set to false, will not use this operation for rendering.

width.description: Width of box to rotate to fit.

height.description: Height of box to rotate to fit.

rotation_direction.description: Direction of rotation if we rotate. Clockwise or counterclockwise.

enabled.description: If set to false, will not use this operation for rendering.

opacity.description: Opacity of shadow. Default is 0, transparent. Goes up to 100 for opaque.

sigma.description: Sigma controls the fuzziness of the shadow within the radius. Small values like 0.5 work best for good results.

blur_radius.description: Radius of edge blurring, controls how far it can spread. In pixels.

color.description: Color to use for shadow in hex without the # sign, example: "0F0F0F"

enabled.description: If set to false, will not use this operation for rendering.

fuzzy.description: How fuzzy the color look up is to remove as background. The value 0 is a good default for clear images.

enabled.description: If set to false, will not use this operation for rendering.
If set to false, will not use this operation for rendering.

noop.description: Deprecated! Use an empty stack operations collection to get the same behaviour

width.description: Width to which the image will be cropped.

height.description: Height to which the image will be cropped.

anchor.description: Anchor from where to crop from. Please see the operations documentation for details.

fallback.description: Anchor fallback to use, when no subject area could be found.

mode.description: If width and height should be taken as absolute values or as a ratio.

area.description: If a special area per image should taken for subject or crop area.

scale.description: Scales the crop box down to the specified percentage. Use mainly with the ratio mode.

enabled.description: If set to false, will not use this operation for rendering.

mode.description: Mode of composition. Please refer to the documentation for details.

resize_mode.description: Mode of resizing operation when including an image. Please see operations documentation for details on each one.

resize_to_primary.description: Mode of resizing operation when including an image. Please see operations documentation for details on each one.

anchor.description: Anchor where to place the composition, based on mode. Please see the operations documentation for details.

secondary_color.description: Color to use as filler in hex without the # sign, example: "0F0F0F"

secondary_opacity.description: Opacity of filler. Default is 0, transparent. Goes up to 100 for opaque.

enabled.description: If set to false, will not use this operation for rendering.

sigma.description: Affects how blurred the image is

enabled.description: If set to false, will not use this operation for rendering.
If set to false, will not use this operation for rendering.
If set to false, will not use this operation for rendering.
If set to false, will not use this operation for rendering.

brightness.description: Brightness adjustments in %, 100 means no adjustments

saturation.description: Saturation adjustments in %, 100 means no adjustments

hue.description: Hue adjustments in degrees, 0 means no adjustments, 180 means to opposite color on the color wheel.

enabled.description: If set to false, will not use this operation for rendering.

mode.description: Mode of alpha operation. Please see operations documentation for details on each one.

opacity.description: Opacity of for mode "apply". Default is 50. Goes from 0 up to 100 for opaque.

enabled.description: If set to false, will not use this operation for rendering.

amount.description: How much glitch should be applied. Default is 4

random.description: Just a random string to circumvent caching for different results. Has no influence on the result

enabled.description: If set to false, will not use this operation for rendering.

delay.description: How much delay between frames. Default 10.

enabled.description: If set to false, will not use this operation for rendering.
